CustomField.description: IF First Date is before 8/1/1953 OR After 12/31/1987 THEN False ELSE True
CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(First_Date_at_Camp_Lejuene__c), TRUE, IF(First_Date_at_Camp_Lejuene__c < DATE(1953, 8, 1), FALSE, IF(First_Date_at_Camp_Lejuene__c > DATE(1987, 12, 31), FALSE, TRUE)))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: IF First Date is before 8/1/1953 OR After 12/31/1987 THEN False ELSE True
CustomField.label: Is Valid First Date At Camp Lejeune?
